response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which is valued at $1,200,000 to both you and myself. Considering its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1,080,000. This represents a significant saving of $120,000 compared to the standard market value. I believe this is an attractive proposition that would not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you decide to proceed, I assure you of a seamless transaction and unparalleled customer service. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1080000}
